name: Anthology Communications
tagline: Defining success early on will hold everyone.
description:
Our staff provides outreach, marketing, public relations, design and writing support to a variety of customers across industry sectors. Our approach is rooted in recognizing that comprehensive communications solutions stem from integrating public relations, marketing, advertising, Web and social media strategies under one communications umbrella.
Through judicious planning, Anthology provides a roadmap for customers to connect with their stakeholders and measure outreach activities to maximize their customer's experience.
Founded in 2008, Anthology has a wide range of clients, from federal agencies to nonprofit organizations to private, for profit businesses. A small, woman-owned business based in Washington, DC, Anthology has worked with customers at the leadership and decision making levels of U.S. Department of Veterans Affairs, Labor, Commerce and Education as well as nonprofits such as the National Association of Workforce Boards and the American Association of Community Colleges.
